title: The Korean War veterans who never came home
description: An intractable impasse between the U.S. and North Korea has stymied once-promising efforts to recover the remains of 5,200 troops lost during the Korean War.

title: Russia arrests renowned sociologist amid intense fighting across Ukraine
description: The arrest of Boris Kagarlitsky showed President Vladimir Putin's crackdown on dissent deepening, as Russian lawmakers moved to expand the pool of men who can be drafted to fight in Ukraine.

title: Sinéad O’Connor, Irish singer of ‘Nothing Compares 2 U,’ dies at 56
description: The musician said she was “proud to be a troublemaker,” and made headlines for protesting sexual abuse during a performance on “Saturday Night Live.”

title: Ghana votes to remove death penalty, calling it sign of ‘inhumane’ society
description: “Abolishing the death penalty shows that we are determined as a society not to be inhumane, uncivil, closed, retrogressive and dark," one Ghanaian lawmaker said.

title: Two pilots in Greek plane crash among 39 dead as Mediterranean fires rage
description: A firefighting plane crashed on Greece's Evia island, as Mediterranean wildfires killed an elderly couple in Italy's Sicily and 10 soldiers in Algeria.

title: Putin courts Africa at summit, but many African leaders stay away
description: At a St. Petersburg meeting, Russian President Vladimir Putin will have to defend his renewed blockade of Ukrainian grain and Moscow's unfulfilled promises.

title: The enduring appeal of remote Pacific islands for rich apocalypse preppers
description: Failed crypto exchange FTX’s alleged plans to purchase the nation of Nauru are typical of the wealthy’s doomsday fantasies, experts say.

title: Hun Sen, Asia’s longest-ruling leader, to step down, names son successor
description: Hun Sen's resignation marks the end of a nearly four-decade rule in which he dismantled Cambodia's opposition and brokered closer relations with China.

title: Italy’s Giorgia Meloni, rising far-right star, to get White House welcome
description: Meloni has backed ideologically charged policies at home while supporting Ukraine and staying safely within the Washington consensus on foreign policy.

title: U.S. and China battle for influence in Pacific island nations
description: Fearful Beijing is outcompeting the U.S. in even the tiniest countries, the Biden administration is rushing to boost long-dormant ties throughout the Pacific.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Russia to raise maximum draft age; U.S. to send Kyiv $400M in new aid
description: Russia's lower house passed legislation raising the country's draft age from 27 to 30 as Moscow scrambles to find fighters for its invasion of Ukraine.

title: Inspired by Gandhi, couple goes on hunger strike over pickleball noise
description: Rajnish and Harpreet Dhawan have complained about pickleball courts near their Canada house. They threatened to go on a hunger strike until the noise improved.

title: The war in Ukraine is spurring a revolution in drone warfare using AI
description: Drones empowered with artificial intelligence hold huge promise for Ukraine’s military but could also benefit nefarious non-state actors like terrorists and drug cartels.

title: The world reckons with a new ‘Oppenheimer moment’
description: Just as scientists and policymakers had to face the new logic of the nuclear age, they must face the fraught and mind-bending emergence of generative AI.
